mapper.select: SELECT uNo, name, email, password, ssn, phone, bankName, bankAccountNumber, creditRating, plusRate, count, enrollDate, INTEREST FROM MEMBER WHERE UNO = #{uNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, bankName = #{bankName}, bankAccountNumber = #{bankAccountNumber}, accountHolder = #{accountHolder}, creditRating = #{creditRating}, plusRate = #{plusRate}, count = #{count}, interest = #{interest} WHERE UNO = #{uNo}
